about_the_game:
Stress can sometimes be a burden in everyone's life, isn't it? But worry no more! It's time to blow off some steam and have fun with "Stress Room VR" after a boring day!

Welcome to Stress Stress Room VR! This game will make you forget about your real-life troubles and turn you into a stress-busting master. Put on your VR goggles, grab a baseball bat, and smash everything in the room to release your stress!

Why Stress Stress Room Vr?


Explosive Fun: Turn your room into a stress-busting arena! Vases, furniture, even the walls are your playground!

Unconventional Therapy: You're not limited to throwing stress balls or hitting target boards. Here, only your imagination sets the limits!

Challenging Missions: Packed with challenges! Test your skills while releasing stress and prove your mastery!

Fun Physics: Enjoy the chaos of bursting objects, flying debris, all thanks to the realistic physics engine!

Advanced Customization: Customize your room and gaming experience entirely to your liking. Want more explosions? Here you go!

Stress Room VR will take you away from real-life troubles into a fun and explosive world! Are you ready? Let's start busting some stress!

developers: BROKOLY AJANS VE YAPIM HIZ. TIC. LTD. STI.
name: StressRoom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

publishers: BROKOLY AJANS VE YAPIM HIZ. TIC. LTD. STI.
short_description: With Stress Room VR, boring days are a thing of the past! Put on your VR goggles, grab a baseball bat, and smash everything in the room to relieve stress! Your room becomes an explosion arena, push your limits, and unwind!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Bulgarian*, Danish*, Indonesian*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Polish*, Hungarian*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Czech*, Swedish*, Afrikaans*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Dari*, Armenian*, Estonian*, Persian*, Filipino*, Welsh*, Galician*, Gujarati*, Georgian*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Kazakh*, Quechua*, K'iche'*, Khmer*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Kinyarwanda*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Serbian*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Valencian*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*, Cherokee*, Uzbek*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Irish*, Scots*, Icelandic*
*languages with full audio support
